subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Reggie Bush spun out of a tackle and dove into the end zone for the winning touchdown with 5 minutes 4 seconds left in the Saints’ 22-16 victory against the Falcons.
snippet: Reggie Bush spun out of a tackle and dove into the end zone for the winning touchdown with 5 minutes 4 seconds left in the Saints’ 22-16 victory against the Falcons.
